definition: to dismantle/to disassemble/to open up (sth sealed)/to unpick
to tear open/to tear down/to tear apart/to open

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: Her Social Security card remained in her papers, the original envelope unopened.
sentences.chinese: 她的社保卡仍然在她的信件裏，封口一直沒拆開過。

sentences.english: She tore it open and fished out a note the same size as the first one.
sentences.chinese: 她將它拆開，拿出一張與第一封信一樣大小的便條紙。

sentences.english: My parents asked all did not ask on disassembles the letter looked.
sentences.chinese: 我父母問都不問就把信拆開來看。

sentences.english: They were unbelievably sharp and could be taken apart so they could be washed or the blades sharpened.
sentences.chinese: 剪刀很鋒利，兩邊可以拆開來清洗或是磨刀口。

sentences.english: If the screen pack or pipe has the damage can ravel flowmeter check, remove impurities.
sentences.chinese: 若過濾網或管道有損壞可拆開流量計檢查，去除雜質。
我希望有人拆開這條縫。

sentences.english: I'll have to strip down the engine to trace the fault.
sentences.chinese: 我得把發動機拆開才能找出毛病來。

sentences.english: Kearns went down to the basement and took it apart.
sentences.chinese: 卡恩斯跑去地下室把雨刷控制器拆開。

sentences.english: He took the watch apart to repair it.

sentences.chinese: 我可以把這些縫口拆開。

sentences.english: They were unbelievably sharp and could be taken apart so they could be washed or the 10)blades sharpened.
sentences.chinese: 剪刀很鋒利，兩邊可以拆開來清洗或是磨刀口。

sentences.english: Please do not disassemble the board at the right side unnecessarily, for the sake of safety.
sentences.chinese: 非必要時請勿拆開右側之差板以策安全。

sentences.english: If do not arise to repeat a value in great quantities, can consider to ravel clause.
sentences.chinese: 如果不產生大量重複值，可以考慮把子句拆開。

sentences.english: She ripped the seams of the overcoat.
The young fellow disassembles the first 98 replies, all is the spatial envelope.
sentences.chinese: 小夥子拆開前98封回信，全是空信封。

sentences.english: Take the watch apart and see if you can see what's wrong with it.
sentences.chinese: 把手錶拆開來看看你能不能檢查出什麼毛病。
